name: Jurassic Jamboree (DEMO)
description:
Controls: Z , X, Enter, Shift, Arrow Keys

This is just the Demo,  I wanted to let more people try the game so I can get plenty of feedback to make it a better game. Please let me know below what you liked about the game and if you see any ways to make the game more enjoyable. Thank you for playing! The game is best played on a Gameboy or even a Gameboy emulator.

For this demo I used awesome sound effects by Coffee Bat! Check those out here:  https://benjaminno.itch.io/sweet-sounds-sfx-pack

Everything else was done by me (howdy riceball)
